data.lyric:
[ti:Start Again (《十三个原因 第二季》电视剧插曲)]
[ar:OneRepublic / Logic]
[al:Start Again]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]Start Again (《十三个原因 第二季》电视剧插曲) - OneRepublic/Logic
[00:01.40]Ryan Tedder：
[00:04.93]Can't I just turn back the clock
[00:07.76]Forgive my sins
[00:09.45]I just wanna roll my sleeves up
[00:12.22]And start again
[00:14.56]I know that I messed it up
[00:17.45]Time and time again
[00:19.32]I just wanna roll my sleeves up
[00:22.04]And start again
[00:24.52]I was switchin' up the lanes
[00:27.15]Steppin' out the frame I'm in
[00:29.44]I was pulling on the reins
[00:31.89]Sick of all the same happenin'
[00:33.66]I swear I was looking for disaster
[00:36.88]Mixed with a bottle of gin
[00:38.40]And just because I come home after
[00:41.81]Doesn't mean you'll take me in
[00:43.16]You see my world is spinning like there's nothing below
[00:48.22]You see my world is feeling like it just might explode
[00:52.99]And yes I know it's hard to take it backwards from my mind
[00:59.22]I need to get it right need to see some light come in
[01:02.91]Can't I just turn back the clock
[01:05.92]Forgive my sins
[01:07.66]I just wanna roll my sleeves up
[01:10.62]And start again
[01:12.56]I know that I messed it up
[01:15.44]Time and time again
[01:17.63]I just wanna roll my sleeves up
[01:20.21]And start again
[01:22.96]Logic：
[01:23.60]Feelin' like maybe I'm unappreciated
[01:25.69]Like my presence in your life has been alleviated
[01:28.04]I feel like everything I've done before is different now
[01:30.49]But I can see clearer than ever from a distance now
[01:32.74]Every day I do it I been goin' through it
[01:34.60]But you never knew it 'cause I never showed you
[01:36.97]You gave me the world so I feel I owed you
[01:39.48]I been lookin' through the mirror and that's the old you
[01:41.51]I'ma get it right now don't know how
[01:44.12]But I promise that we're gonna make it somehow
[01:46.62]I'm all in it's from the heart again
[01:49.08]Open up your mind and maybe we could start again
[01:51.01]Ryan Tedder：
[01:51.32]Can't I just turn back the clock
[01:54.43]Forgive my sins
[01:56.40]I just wanna roll my sleeves up
[01:59.10]And start again
[02:01.04]I know that I messed it up
[02:04.07]Time and time again
[02:06.14]I just wanna roll my sleeves up
[02:08.69]And start again
[02:10.98]Oh oh oh oh oh oh
[02:15.85]Oh oh oh oh oh oh
[02:20.67]And yes I know it's hard to take it backwards from my mind
[02:26.51]I need to get it right need to see some light come in
[02:30.25]Can't I just turn back the clock
[02:33.22]Forgive my sins
[02:35.05]I just wanna roll my sleeves up
[02:37.69]And start again
data.trans:
[ti:Start Again (《十三个原因 第二季》电视剧插曲)]
[ar:OneRepublic / Logic]
[al:Start Again]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]//
[00:01.40]//
[00:04.93]我无法让时间倒回
[00:07.76]原谅我的罪过
[00:09.45]我只想撸起袖子
[00:12.22]重新开始
[00:14.56]我知道我搞砸了一切
[00:17.45]一次又一次
[00:19.32]我只想撸起袖子
[00:22.04]重新开始
[00:24.52]我正在转变方向 
[00:27.15]走出曾经有过的荣誉之中
[00:29.44]我正在远离那些狐朋狗友
[00:31.89]厌倦了同样的情况不断发生
[00:33.66]我发誓 我是在寻找灾难
[00:36.88]混着一瓶杜松子酒
[00:38.40]因为我等一下就回家
[00:41.81]这并不意味着你会带我进去
[00:43.16]你看 我的世界正在旋转 仿佛底下什么都没有
[00:48.22]你看 我的整个世界仿佛即将爆炸
[00:52.99]是的我知道 让我的想法转变回从前很难
[00:59.22]我要改善这种情况 我要看到光芒照进来
[01:02.91]我无法让时间倒回
[01:05.92]原谅我的罪过
[01:07.66]我只想撸起袖子
[01:10.62]重新开始
[01:12.56]我知道我搞砸了一切
[01:15.44]一次又一次
[01:17.63]我只想撸起袖子
[01:20.21]重新开始
[01:22.96]//
[01:23.60]似乎无人欣赏我
[01:25.69]你生命之中我的存在感也渐渐变弱
[01:28.04]我感觉之前做过的事现在都不同了
[01:30.49]但我现在比以往任何时候都看得更加透彻
[01:32.74]每一天我都重复这件事 我经历过
[01:34.60]但你永远不会知道 因为我不曾让你看见
[01:36.97]你给我了全世界 所以我以为我拥有了你
[01:39.48]我透过镜子 看见了年老的你
[01:41.51]不知怎么的 我瞬间就明白了
[01:44.12]但我发誓 无论如何我们会做到的
[01:46.62]我会全身心投入 重新开始
[01:49.08]打开你的心房 也许我们可以重新开始
[01:51.01]//
[01:51.32]我无法让时间倒回
[01:54.43]原谅我的罪过
[01:56.40]我只想撸起袖子
[01:59.10]重新开始
[02:01.04]我知道我搞砸了一切
[02:04.07]一次又一次
[02:06.14]我只想撸起袖子
[02:08.69]重新开始
[02:10.98]//
[02:15.85]//
[02:20.67]是的我知道 让我的想法转变回从前很难
[02:26.51]我要改善这种情况 我要看到光芒照进来
[02:30.25]我无法让时间倒回
[02:33.22]原谅我的罪过
[02:35.05]我只想撸起袖子
[02:37.69]重新开始
